text: Ramana Maharshi (; 30 December 1879 â€“ 14 April 1950) was an Indian Hindu sage and jivanmukta (liberated being). He was born Venkataraman Iyer, but is mostly known by the name Bhagavan Sri Ramana Maharshi. == References == ==Sources== * * * Category:1879 births Category:1950 deaths Category:Indian Hindus
title: Ramana Maharshi
